name: Taste of Power
detailed_description:
"Taste of Power" is a game in the genre of RTS. The basis of the game world is the era of the alternative Medieval: the world in which the lands of Europe and China are located close to each other. Due to this, a clash of cultures, which did not happen in reality, such as the crusade to India, the samurai sailing to Byzantium, the invasion of Saracens into China, takes place ...

The mechanics of "Taste of Power" combines deep strategic elements with dynamic and diverse actions. Each unit is fundamentally different from the representatives of other factions and it is effective only in a certain situation. Thanks to this, one of the components of the victory is discovering of the enemy's troops and the creation of an army that functionally surpasses it. Another element of the victory is receiving of the economic advantage over the enemy. For this, the player needs to develop their cities and build new ones. Due to the fact that the cities are vulnerable to enemy attacks, there is a significant increase in the need of controlling strategic positions and competent maneuvering by the troops to defend their possessions and destroy enemy settlements.

If you are a fan of real-time strategy and you are close to the Medieval, the game will give you a new gaming experience and impressions.
